# querySignature

**Instance Property**

The query signature for the match.

## Declaration

```swift
var querySignature: SHSignature { get }
```

## Reading match information

- **mediaItems**: An array of the media items in the catalog that match the query signature, in order of the quality of the match.

items.description: An array of the media items in the catalog that match the query signature, in order of the quality of the match.
